葝葝葝

葝字的基本解释

葝
qíng
山薤。亦称“野藠头”。

葝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］
［《廣韻》渠京切，平庚，羣。］
山薤。又称“野藠頭”。生山地。
[②]［jìng］
［《集韻》堅正切，去勁，見。］
鼠尾草。

葝字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葝； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1045第12
【唐韻】渠京切，音擎。【爾雅·釋草】葝，山薤。【疏】薤生山中者名葝。　又【集韻】堅正切，音勁。【爾雅·釋草】葝，䑕尾。【註】可以染皁。【疏】一名陵翹。　【廣韻】又作?。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】葝，鼠尾。【註】可以染草。〕　謹照原文染草改染皁。
葝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
葝字的起名意思

暂无。

Fen
Basic explanation of words
Fen
qíng
Mountain scallion. Also known as "Wild Huotou".
Fen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］
["Guangyun" Qu Jingqie, Ping Geng, Qun. ]
Mountain scallion. Also known as "Wild Huotou". Raw mountain.
[②]［jìng］
["Jiyun" firm tangent, go hard, see you. ]
sage.
Fen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Words] 　葝; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1045 Page 12
[Tang Yun] Qu Jing cut, sound engine. 【Erya·Shucao】Chen, Shan scallion. 【Sparse】The name of the scallion in the mountains.　[Jiyun] Strong tangent, sound strength. 【Erya·Shicao】葝，葕尾. [Note] You can dye soap. [Sparse] A Ling Qiao.　[Guangyun] Again? Textual research: [[Erya·Shucao] Fen, rat tail. [Note] You can dye grass. 〕 　 I would like to dye grass instead of soap according to the original text.
Fen
